name: 2023 the 8th International Conference on Big Data Analytics
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICBDA 2023 conference Proceedings by IEEE. Conference content will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, as well as other Abstracting and Indexing (A&I) databases.
